name: Dead men tell no tales (Artificial Games Team)
name_original: Dead men tell no tales (Artificial Games Team)
description: The Attack of the Dead Men was a battle of World War I that took place at Osowiec Fortress (now northeast Poland), on August 6, 1915. The incident got its name from the bloodied, zombie-like appearance of the Russian combatants after they were bombarded with a mixture of poison gases by the Germans.
